thread.title: BREAKING: Barclays bank 'crashes nationwide' stranding Brits without weekend cash
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Barclays bank 'crashes nationwide' stranding Brits without weekend cash

title: BREAKING: Barclays bank 'crashes nationwide' stranding Brits without weekend cash
text:
BREAKING: Barclays bank 'crashes nationwide' stranding Brits without weekend cash BREAKING: Barclays bank 'crashes nationwide' stranding Brits without weekend cash BRITS banking with Barclays are unable to withdraw cash or use their bank cards after a nationwide computer crash.   
People have reported on social media that their bank cards are being declined in resturants and shops. 
Staff at an Ealing branch put up a sign which read: “Due to unforeseen circumstances our computer systems have crashed and we are unable to complete transactions. 
“We apologise for the inconvenience. This is a national issue.” 
Daily Star Online have contacted Barclays bank for comment. 
MORE TO FOLLOW
